title: 4 Secrets of Successful Options Traders (Scott Bauer)

source.author: Scott Bauer, CEO Prosper Trading Academy
source.title: Options Trading Secrets | Top 4 Secrets of SUCCESSFUL Options Traders

summary: Psychology and business foundations for successful trading - mindset over indicators

secrets.name: Find Your Individual Trading Style
secrets.action: Experiment to see what fits your personality and financial goals. Some rely on technical analysis, others on fundamentals. No single path works for everyone.
secrets.relevance_to_us: Our automated system uses credit spreads with technical signals. Manual override should be rare.

secrets.name: Master the Art of Professional Losing
secrets.action: Treat losses with objectivity and acceptance. NEVER 'hope and pray' for losing trades to reverse. Exit objectively - holding on is amateur behavior.
secrets.relevance_to_us: DIRECTLY supports Phil Town Rule #1 and our stop-loss discipline. Added to losing SOFI position on Jan 13 violated this.

secrets.name: Operate Trading Like a Business
secrets.action: Dedicate specific hours to trading 'business' for market research and analysis. Structure every position with care like inventory management.
secrets.relevance_to_us: Our 9:35 AM ET trade window enforces this. Daily workflow = business hours.

secrets.name: Eliminate FOMO
secrets.action: There will ALWAYS be another trade. If conviction is not 100%, pass immediately and wait for next opportunity.
secrets.relevance_to_us: CRITICAL for $5K account. One bad FOMO trade can wipe days of gains. Must enforce via pre-trade checklist.
secrets.implementation: Add FOMO check to daily-trading.yml: 'Is conviction 100%? If not, skip today.'

strategic_benefits_noted: Profit from theta decay and IV changes
action_items: Add FOMO prevention check to pre-trade verification
Reference 'professional losing' in stop-loss reminder messages
Document trading hours as 'business hours' in system
